document_data.name: Quiche
document_data.mainbody: '''Quiche''' was a type of small savory open-faced hand-[[tart]] handfood from [[northwest Faerûn]] and the city of [[Neverwinter]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190914002019/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-09.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan – Mar 2009| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Availability:
[[Neveren]] quiches were pies typically filled with [[cheese]], [[spinach]], and [[mushroom]]s. They could be consumed hot as well as cold. [[Elminster]]'s favorite variety was made with yellow cheese and meat. During some of his trips to [[Earth]] and [[Ed Greenwood]]'s home, Elminster partook in a variety of Earth's mass-produced quiches, which he didn't care for, and once he even made quiche with a mysterious local meat called "spam."

''[[Tupidratkrea's summon quiche]]'' [[spell]] had some relation to the tarts, presumably summoning them via magic.{{Cite dragon/402/The Rise of Bardic Beauty|4}}
